name: RCID
description: The only constraint on usage of this subfield is that the concatenation of the RCID and RCNM subfields must be unique within the file in which the record is contained.

name: GRUP
description: Used to separate feature objects into groups

name: OBJL
description: A valid object label/code

name: RVER
description: Record version is used for updating and contains the serial number of the record edition

name: AGEN
description: Numeric agency code

name: FIDN
description: The “Feature Object Identification Number” ranges from 1 to 232-2. The “Feature Object Identification Subdivision” ranges from 1 to 216-2. Both subfields are used to create an unique key for a feature object produced by the agency encoded in the AGEN subfield. The usage of the FIDN and FIDS subfields is not constrained and must be defined by the encoder.

name: FIDS
description: The “Feature Object Identification Number” ranges from 1 to 232-2. The “Feature Object Identification Subdivision” ranges from 1 to 216-2. Both subfields are used to create an unique key for a feature object produced by the agency encoded in the AGEN subfield. The usage of the FIDN and FIDS subfields is not constrained and must be defined by the encoder.

name: LNAM
description: Long name.  An encoding of AGEN, FIDN and FIDS used to uniquely identify this features within an S-57 file.

name: LNAM_REFS
description: List of long names of related features

name: FFPT_RIND
alias: Feature to feature object pointer relationship indicator
description: Relationship indicators for each of the LNAM_REFS relationships.

name: BOYSHP
description: Buoy shape; the principal shapes are those recommended in the International Association of Lighthouse Authorities - IALA System.

name: CATSPM
description: A mark may be a beacon, a buoy, a signpost or may take another form. Value number 38 should be encoded using object class signal station, traffic (SISTAT).

name: COLOUR
description: Color; must be encoded for all LIGHTS objects, except air obstruction lights or fog detector lights.

name: COLPAT
description: Color pattern; Mandatory for ANY OBJECT that has more than one colour.

name: CONRAD
description: Radar conspicuous

name: DATEND
description: The attribute 'date end' indicates the latest date on which an object (e.g. a buoy) will be present. This attribute is to be used to indicate the removal or cancellation of an object at a specific date in the future. See also 'periodic date end'

name: DATSTA
description: The attribute 'date, start' indicates the earliest date on which an object (e.g. a buoy) will be present. This attribute is to be used to indicate the deployment or implementation of an object at a specifi c date in the future. See also 'periodic date start'.

name: MARSYS
description: System of navigational marks

name: NOBJNM
description: The attribute 'object name in national language' encodes the individual name of an object in the specified national language.

name: OBJNAM
description: The individual name of an object.

name: PEREND
description: The end of the active period for a seasonal object (e.g. a buoy). See also 'date end'.

name: PERSTA
description: The start of the active period for a seasonal object (e.g. a buoy). See also 'date start'.

name: STATUS
description: Object status

name: VERACC
description: The best estimate of the vertical accuracy of heights, vertical distances and vertical clearances, excluding sounding measurements.

name: VERLEN
description: The total vertical length of an object.

name: INFORM
description: Textual information about the object.

name: NINFOM
description: Textual information in national language characters

name: NTXTDS
description: Indicates whether a text file containing text extracted from relevant pilot books or navigational publications is available.

name: PICREP
description: Indicates whether a pictorial representation of the object is available.

name: SCAMAX
description: The maximum scale at which the object may be used e.g. for ECDIS presentation.

name: SCAMIN
description: The minimum scale at which the object may be used e.g. for ECDIS presentation.

name: TXTDSC
description: Indicates that a file containing text extracted from relevant pilot books or navigational publications is available.

name: RECDAT
description: The date when the specific object or cartographic primitive was captured, edited or deleted.

name: RECIND
description: The procedure for the encoding and entering of data

name: SORDAT
description: The production date of the source, e.g. the date of measurement.

name: SORIND
description: Information about the source of the object.

name: SOURCE_FILE
description: NOAA ENC file name of source data
